name: Jam Shaman
description:
Jam Shaman, come on and slam!

Jam Shaman is a game about a shaman who helps a family living nearby with their several troubles. No matter the situation, Jam Shaman (the player) can solve any problem with button-specific dance moves. Each round consists of three different problems, and playing well enough the player can solve all of them and make the family happy again!.

- Several different situations, still all the same gameplay!

- Cheap animations!

- A shaman drum and a bouncing bone!

- Bass-heavy drum beats for all you kids out there!
